title: Web Development Concepts - MODERATE Level
description: ðŸ”¥ Step up your game! This test dives deeper into HTML5, CSS3, and a touch of JavaScript âš¡. Get ready to style, structure, and script like a real web dev ninja ðŸ¥·. Perfect for learners who want to go beyond the basics. (20 Questions - 30 Minutes)

questions.text: Which HTML5 tag is used to represent self-contained content like a blog post?
Which CSS property is used to create space inside an element, between the content and the border?
Which attribute in <input> defines the type of control (text, password, etc.)?
Which CSS property is used to change the font of text?
What is the default position value of an HTML element in CSS?
Which HTML element is used to play video files?
Which JavaScript keyword declares a block-scoped variable?
Which CSS property controls the visibility of an element?
Which pseudo-class selects the first child element?
Which HTML attribute specifies an image's alternate text?
Which CSS layout uses rows and columns for alignment?
Which JavaScript function is used to parse a string into an integer?
Which CSS property makes text all uppercase?
Which HTML5 element is used for navigation links?
Which CSS unit is relative to the font-size of the element?
Which JavaScript method writes to the browser console?
Which CSS property creates rounded corners?
Which HTML tag is used to embed audio?
Which CSS property adds shadow to text?
Which HTML5 tag is used for drawing graphics via JavaScript?
